mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_board (title, nickname, content, create_dt, user_seq, file, price) VALUES (#{title}, #{nickname}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIME(), #{user_seq}, #{file}, #{price})
INSERT INTO file (orgName, savedName, savedPath, create_dt) VALUES ( #{orgName}, #{savedName}, #{savedPath}, CURRENT_TIME() )
mapper.select: SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY seq) AS rownum FROM s_board WHERE status='N'
SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY file.seq) AS rownum, sb.* FROM file file INNER JOIN kahyun.s_board sb ON file.savedName = sb.file
mapper.update: update s_board set download_count = download_count+1 where file = #{file}
